This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"removeStableToken(address)":{"custom:error":"ChatterPay__ZeroAddress if the token address is zeroChatterPay__NotStableToken if the token is not marked as stable","details":"Only callable by the contract owner","params":{"token":"The address of the token to remove from the stable list"}},"removeTokenFromWhitelist(address)":{"params":{"token":"Token to remove"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. addStableToken(address).custom:error: ChatterPay__ZeroAddress if the token address is zeroChatterPay__AlreadyStableToken if the token is already marked as stable
addStableToken(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.token: The address of the token to mark as stable

execute(address,uint256,bytes).details: Only for use in emergencies or special cases

executeBatchTokenTransfer(address[],addr.details: All arrays must have the same length

params.amounts: Array of token amounts to transfer
params.recipients: Array of addresses that will receive tokens
params.tokens: Array of token addresses to transfer

params.amountOutMin: Minimum amount of output tokens expected

executeTokenTransfer(address,address,uin.details: Only callable by the EntryPoint contract and protected against reentrancy

params.amount: The total amount of tokens to transfer (including fee)
params.recipient: The address that will receive the tokens
params.token: The ERC20 token address to transfer

returns._0: The address of the ChatterPay wallet owner.

params.pairHash: The hash identifying the token pair.

returns._0: The custom pool fee in basis points.
The slippage value in basis points.

getTokenFee(address).details: Reverts if the token is not whitelisted

returns._0: The calculated fee in token units
True if the token is stable, false otherwise.
True if the token is whitelisted, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

removeStableToken(address).custom:error: ChatterPay__ZeroAddress if the token address is zeroChatterPay__NotStableToken if the token is not marked as stable
removeStableToken(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.token: The address of the token to remove from the stable list

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Overrides the standard transferOwnership to manage fee admin privileges

params.newOwner: Address of the new contract owner

updateLimits(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner.

params.deadline: New maximum deadline in seconds for swap execution.
params.maxFeeCents: New maximum fee in cents allowed for a transaction.

updatePriceConfig(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner.

params.precision: New precision factor for price normalization.

updateSlippageMaxBps(uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner.

params.slippageMaxBps: New slippage limit in basis points.

updateUniswapPoolFees(uint24,uint24,uint.details: Only callable by the contract owner.

params.high: Pool fee reserved for high-volatility pairs.
params.low: Pool fee for stable-to-stable token swaps.
params.medium: Pool fee for regular token swaps.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

PRICE_FEED_PRECISION().notice: Precision constant used for price feed normalization (e.g., 8 decimals)

addStableToken(address).notice: Adds a token to the list of recognized stablecoins

approveToken(address,uint256).notice: Approves a token to be spent by the Uniswap Router

execute(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Allows the owner of the factory to execute arbitrary calls

executeBatchTokenTransfer(address[],addr.notice: Executes multiple token transfers with fee deduction

executeSwap(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Executes a swap through Uniswap V3

executeTokenTransfer(address,address,uin.notice: Executes a token transfer from this contract to a recipient

getChatterPayOwner().notice: Returns the owner of the ChatterPay wallet.

getCustomPoolFee(bytes32).notice: Returns a custom Uniswap pool fee set for a specific token pair.

getCustomSlippage(address).notice: Returns the custom slippage value set for a given token.

getEntryPoint().notice: Returns the address of the EntryPoint used by this wallet.

getFeeInCents().notice: Returns the fee configured for token operations.

getMaxDeadline().notice: Returns the maximum allowed deadline for a swap.

getMaxFeeInCents().notice: Returns the maximum fee allowed in cents.

getPoolFees().notice: Returns the configured pool fees (low, medium, high).

getPriceFeed(address).notice: Returns the price feed address for a given token.

getPriceFeedPrecision().notice: Returns the precision factor used when calculating prices.

getPriceFreshnessThreshold().notice: Returns the price freshness threshold used to validate Chainlink feeds.

getSlippageMaxBps().notice: Returns the maximum allowed slippage in basis points.

getSwapRouter().notice: Returns the current Uniswap router configured.

getTokenFee(address).notice: Returns the fee amount in token units for a given token,         using the global feeInCents value from contract state.

implementation().notice: Returns the address of the current implementation.

isStableToken(address).notice: Checks if a token is marked as stable.

isTokenWhitelisted(address).notice: Checks if a token is whitelisted for swaps.

removeStableToken(address).notice: Removes a token from the list of recognized stablecoins

setCustomPoolFee(address,address,uint24).notice: Sets a custom pool fee for a specific token pair

setCustomSlippage(address,uint256).notice: Sets custom slippage for a token

setTokenWhitelistAndPriceFeed(address,bo.notice: Sets token whitelist and price feed

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract with additional privilege management

updatePriceConfig(uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the configuration for Chainlink price feeds.

updateSlippageMaxBps(uint256).notice: Updates the maximum allowed slippage for swaps.

updateUniswapPoolFees(uint24,uint24,uint.notice: Updates the Uniswap pool fee tiers used for swaps.

@notice Internal state struct containing all configurable and runtime parameters for ChatterPay.
 @dev This struct is stored at a custom storage slot to support upgradeable proxy patterns.

@notice Storage slot for the implementation address in proxy pattern

@notice Signature validation failed return code for ERC-4337 simulations.
 @dev Used to signal a bad signature without reverting in simulation.

@notice Signature validation success return code for ERC-4337 simulations.
 @dev Used to signal a valid signature during simulation.
@notice Precision constant used for price feed normalization (e.g., 8 decimals)
